name: Funny Walk
description:
After Deity Driving and Beautycopter, the final entry of a trilogy you've likely never heard of is here! You've been invited to a talk show because of your special interests (collecting roadside treasure, having free time), but the world isn't quite ready yet for you...

Features:

  • A story about garbage and glamour
  • Digitized sprites, but not a single fatality!
  • A mix of genres unpopular with straight men
  • Fast movements and some slow moments
